item.description:
We'll take the blue/orange trail out to the end of Breakneck Pond and head back on the blue trail. There are lots of beautiful spots along the way for breaks. Make sure you bring enough water for you and your dog, although they can always get a drink from the pond :)

Directions

Bigelow Hollow State Park
I-84 to Exit 73 or 74, then follow Route 190 north to Route 171 east to the park entrance.


Visit http://www.ct.gov/Dep... for more information on the park.

I hope to see lots of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Go through the park entrance to the third parking area on the left. Look for the white "Crate Escape" truck.
item.name: Hike at Bigelow Hollow State Park
